About the game: ALRIGHT! URBAN TRIAL TRICKY DELUXE EDITION IS HERE! Now you can fully express yourself while exploring the urban jungle. With the full package of motorbike tricks, style, and extreme levels you will become unstoppable! üèçÔ∏è KEY FEATURES üèçÔ∏è Exciting light-hearted casual gameplay Crazy mix of tricks, platforming, and racing Killer tricks to combine in countless combos Super-smooth experience 3 single-player modes Over 30 levels + side challenges Savage customization options Leaderboards to rule Infinite gameplay More freedom, more fun. Riding in both directions. Urban Trial Tricky Deluxe Edition includes six additional savage customization options each with new rider skin, signature special trick, and the matching motorbike paint job. DEFY GRAVITY WITH CRAZY TRICKS! BECOME A CRAZY TRICKSTER! Grab your seat and pull off the most savage tricks and combos on your motorbike. Ride freely, spin around in the air, go back and forth and let yourself be carried away by the fun, fast-paced gameplay, colorful visuals, and smooth controls. GET STYLISH! Learn new freestyle, breakdance and FMX moves to fit your own style. Unlock crazy costumes and customize your motorbike at will. PUSH YOURSELF AND OTHERS TO GREATNESS! Complete challenges and master countless outstanding maneuvers and tricks to rule the leaderboards.
